tileset = "cave4";
area = "gemmine3";
areaname = "Gem Mine";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "GemMine";
A_sprites = [{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:8,y:30,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"BOSSROOM",model:"area_transition",x:9,y:27,dest:["gemmine4",9,12]},{name:"S",model:"area_transition",x:3,y:29,dest:["gemmine2",29,2],ARROW:"S"}];
if(GameData.plotVars.BRIEFING < 3 && GameData.plotVars.GemMinesBandits1 != 2)
{
   A_sprites = A_sprites.concat([{name:"Gope",model:"bandit",x:8,y:32,walkspeed:-2,dir:"w",elem:"EARTH",conv:"c_mines"},{name:"INTERJECTION",model:"_trigger",x:12,y:32,ExecuteScript:function()
   {
      GameData.plotVars.GemMinesBandits1 = 2;
      _root.Interjection("Mardek","GemMinesBandits2","c_mines");
   }}]);
}
areaLoot = [{x:19,y:23,type:"item",amount:1,item:"CopperRing"},{x:20,y:14,type:"item",amount:1,item:"Null Locket"},{x:3,y:2,type:"item",amount:1,item:"RingOfSPR"},{x:28,y:33,type:"item",amount:1,item:"PhoenixDown"}];

if(GameData.plotVars.BRIEFING < 3)
{
   foes = foes.concat([["Bandit",null,null,null,"SOLO"],["Bandit","Bandit",null,null,"DUO"]]);
}
AreaSetup({WARP:1});
